key.name: tray-icon
key.summary: Display an icon in the system tray
key.description: If enabled, an icon will be placed into the system tray to, for example, display the current Tailscale connection status.

key.name: show-notification-on-startup
key.description: If enabled, shows a notification when the application starts

key.name: polling-interval
key.summary: Interval at which to poll the Tailscale daemon
key.description: An interval, in seconds, at which to poll the Tailscale daemon for status changes and other things.
